scripts.patch: copy /Y "./README.md" "./package/README.md" && cd package && npm version patch && npm publish && cd ../
scripts.minor: copy /Y "./README.md" "./package/README.md" && cd package && npm version minor && npm publish && cd ../
scripts.major: copy /Y "./README.md" "./package/README.md" && cd package && npm version major && npm publish && cd ../
